product_name: Teva Kimtah WP Mesh Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: With a sporty waterproof leather and mesh upper for year-round, all-around versatility, the Teva Kimtah WP Mesh shoes are built for on-trail fun. Highlights of the Kimtah WP mesh shoes include roomy toe boxes, waterproof construction and grippy outsoles. Leather and nylon mesh uppers feature T.I.D.E. Seal waterproof membranes to keep your feet dry as you trek through water. Full-grain leather and polyester linings conform to feet for lasting comfort; EVA midsoles feature Shoc Pad(TM) cushions in the heels for shock absorption. Spider365 Rubber outsoles provide sure footing in all kinds of environments; aggressive lug pattern is great for loose terrain.
short_description: With a sporty waterproof leather and mesh upper for year-round, all-around versatility, the Teva Kimtah WP Mesh shoes are built for on-trail fun.
